resources.string:
Added option so hide direct paging vendor response menu buttons.
 
 New Locations:
 EmergyCare in Erie County, PA
 Louisa County, VA (replacement)
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Ozark, AL
 Butte County, CA
 Polk County, IN
 Howard County, MD
 Somerset County, NJ
 Monmouth County,NJ
 Morris County, NJ
 Sussex County, NJ
 Chatauqua County, NY
 Genesee County, NY
 Madison County, NY
 Nassau County, NY
 Oneida County, NY
 Suffolk COunty, NY
 Cabarrus County, NC
 Marion County, OR
 Bucks County, PA
 Greenville County, SC
 
 General Fixes:
 Fixed to work properly with Pansi SMS. Handcent and Go SMS remain uncooperative.
 Fixed problem that may be responsible for sporadic widget issues.
 Fixed some problems with general alert reports.
 Using return key to close call detail window wil now clear Cadpage notifications.
